department: Public Works and Government Services Canada
description: To replace the roof of Renfrew Collections Storage facility located in Renfrew, Ontario. The project includes demolition of existing EPDM roof assembly and installation of a new inverted roof system with lightweight vegetative elements.

# Government Tender Announcement: EP076-241734 - Renfrew Collection Storage (RCS) Roof Replacement
## Contract Reference Information

## Background and Brief Description
The Renfrew Collections Storage (RCS) facility, located in Renfrew, Ontario, requires roof replacement. The project entails the demolition of the existing EPDM roof assembly and installation of a new inverted roof system with vegetative elements.

## Proposal Submission
The tender is scheduled for sealing on 2024-06-26T14:00:00, but all required documents must be submitted by 2024-06-26T14:00:00. Only bids submitted on time will be considered.

## Process Overview
This is the first phase of a two-phase process. The second phase will invite qualified bidders to submit financial bids for the project.

## Contact Information
Kwan, Isaac
Email: [isaac.kwan@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:isaac.kwan@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

## Additional Information
The SAP Ariba Discovery posting at the link provided contains complete project details.
